title: Namaste Yoga Season 3 E01-E13 with Erica Blitz x264 aac [MP4]

Namaste Yoga is the world's premier instructional yoga series. Experience what yoga at home should feel like: stunning visuals, soothing music and authentic yoga sequences that will calm your mind, strengthen your body and inspire your soul. This DVD contains the complete set of Season 3, designed and narrated by master yoga teacher Erica Blitz.
